definitions.definition: To do or say again (and again).
definitions.example: The scientists repeated the experiment in order to confirm the result.

definitions.definition: To echo the words of (a person).
To strike the hours, as a watch does.
To make trial of again; to undergo or encounter again.
To repay or refund (an excess received).

(procedure word) To call in a previous artillery fire mission with the same ammunition and method either on the coordinates or adjusted either because destruction of the target was insufficient or missed.
To commit fraud in an election by voting more than once for the same candidate.
Having been said or done again.
